title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS30082/HS30097Course ContentsIntroduction to Insurance and Risk Management; Insurer Ownership, Financial and Operational Structure; Insurance Regulation; Insolvencies, Solvency Ratings and Solvency Regulation; Insurance Pricing; Risk aversion and Risk Management by Individuals and Corporations; Insurability of risk, contractual Provisions and Legal Doctrines; Loss Control; General Insurance; Life Insurance; Medical Insurance; Tax and Accounting Factors in Insurance Risk Management; Alternative Risk Transfer; Corporate Liability to Customers, third parties and Shareholders; Liability Risk Management in Insurance
